title: Shocking moment off-duty cop pulls his gun and opens fire in fight with teen gang who ‘walked on his lawn’
text:
Opinion TURF WAR Shocking moment off-duty cop pulls his gun and opens fire in fight with teen gang who ‘walked on his lawn’ 
Cop claims the teenager threatened to 'shoot' him but youngster says he used the word 'sue' By DANNY COLLINS 23rd February 2017, 9:40 am A ROW between an off-duty LA cop and a group of teens takes a shocking turn when the officer fires his gun into the air. 
The shocked teens flee the scene of the argument – which erupted when one of the youngsters walked in the man’s front garden. But the youngster, seen here being dragged through a bush, claims he instead told to cop he was going to “sue” him 
Footage captured the moment the man unloaded a shot into the air near Anaheim, California. 
He had previously been scuffling with 13-year-old Christian Dorscht, whose friends watched on as the dispute escalated. 
The LAPD cop accused the youngster of threatening to shoot him before attempting to handcuff him. When friends of the boy intervene and shove the cop through a hedge, he pulls a gun from his trousers and a shot rings out. 
No one was hurt during the incident. 
The teenager has since claimed he threatened to “sue” the cop rather than “shoot” him. 
Members of the group also claimed the shooter had called a girl a “c***” after she walked on his front lawn. 
Dorscht’s father last night scolded the cop over the incident.
